document_data.name: Demra Samdro's Best Beds
document_data.mainbody: '''Demra Samdro's Best Beds''' was a small shop of a maker and seller of grand beds that could be assembled after delivery. The shop was located on [[Saerdoun Street]] in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Demra Samdro's Best Beds shared a three-story-and-an-attic building with a number of other businesses. The building stood on the southern side of Saerdoun Street, three doors west from the intersection with [[Thunderstaff Way]]. Other tenants of the office building were [[Erro Alhandrar's Nets]], [[Tantra Jaressra's Fine Gowns]], [[Laskalan's Lamps and Lanterns]], and [[Vressa's Sweep Begone]], as well as [[Tiger's Eye (shop)|Tiger's Eye]] at one point.
document_data.History: The Best Beds shop was established sometime before the building changed management in the {{YearlinkName|1494}}, now in the hands of the [[gnome]] named [[Hardyn Glorjarn]], who took over the building's attic. The shop's owner and master crafter was a [[dwarf|dwarvish]] exile who operated under the alias of [[Demra Samdro]].
